# File lib/paperclip/matchers/validate_attachment_size_matcher.rb, line 54
        def passes_validation_with_size(new_size)
          file = StringIO.new(".")
          override_method(file, :size){ new_size }
          override_method(file, :to_tempfile){ file }

          (subject = @subject.new).send(@attachment_name).assign(file)
          subject.valid?
          subject.errors.on("#{@attachment_name}_file_size""#{@attachment_name}_file_size").blank?
        end
